text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump Operative phrase "resources going where they are needed". Apparently in February that was China and now to Kushner's stockpile. If he really was preparing since January for the COVID-19 pandemic, you would have been yelling this from the rooftops at that time. Stop gaslighting.
